Feature ModulesÔÉÅ

The MS-dTMT application includes multiple feature modules, each with specific responsibilities and functions. This section will detail the structure, implementation, and purpose of each feature module.

Feature Modules:

  • Splash Module
    • Overview
    • Module Structure
    • Main Features
    • Key Classes and Methods
    • Implementation Details
  • Home Module
    • Overview
    • Module Structure
    • Key Components

  • User Module
    • Overview
    • Module Structure
    • Key Features
    • Core Components
    • Database Design
    • User Registration Flow
    • Integration Points

Each feature module follows a clean architecture approach with Presentation, Domain, and Data layers. For detailed exploration of these layers within each module, select the corresponding feature module.
